text: Baroi kuffori Makka qissai Nuhro ʙixon, on goh ki ʙa qavmi xud guft: «Ej qavmi man, agar istodani man dar mijoni sumo va jodovarii ojoti Alloh ʙar sumo garon meojad, man ʙar Alloh tavakkal namudaam. Pas, dar kori xud hamrohi ʙuthojaton azm kuned, cunon ki jagon ciz az kore, ki mekuned, ʙar sumo pusida naʙosad (ja'ne, ʙemalol va oskoro jakcoja ʙo ʙutho kor gired, man parvoe nadoram) va on ciro mexohed dar haqqi man ancom dihed va maro muxlat nadihed
